Based on the commit history, your `fase-3-arkitektur` branch is significantly behind the `main` branch. To bring it up to date, you need to merge the changes from `main` into it.

Here is the plan:
1. Switch to the `fase-3-arkitektur` branch.
2. Merge the `main` branch into it.
3. Push the updated branch to the remote repository.

I will now switch to the `fase-3-arkitektur` branch.
